artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: caricature of a standing bearded man wearing a large sombrero, jacket and vest, and tight trousers; train engine at right; train stations with people at left; text at top and bottom: "DE TORREON A LERDO / NUEVA / COLECOION / DE CANCIONES / MODERNAS / PARA 190 [illegible--not printed] / PUBLICADA POR / A. VANEGAS ARROYO. / MEXICO. / No. 16"
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: De Torreón a Lerdo (From Torreon to Lerdo), plate 17 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
